posts.post_content:
So, I've decided I don't have the budget or patience to try and get all the Sovereign 150s.  These are tough to find and it would take quite awhile to locate them all.  I'm listing some of mine for sale here, along with some HOFers.

Add $1 for shipping (within the U.S.)

Wallace (crease-free GD+) $60

PM sent on Bresnahan and Evers

Only Willis left.  Beautiful front with back damage.

$35 shipped for it so I can close this thread.
About half still available.  The scan makes the Wallace look pretty bad, so I took a picture of it.  This is more what it actually looks like in hand:
